metadata.methodology: Multi-dimensional scoring across mirror accuracy, insight novelty, and actionability

mirror_accuracy.interpretation: AI correctly understood user behavior in all cases

insight_novelty.interpretation: AI revealed new patterns users didn't self-identify

easy.notes: Strong baseline performance on straightforward patterns

hard.notes: Maintained quality on edge cases, appropriately recognized clinical boundaries

neurodivergent_neurological.notes: No pathologizing, recognized neurological differences as valid

functional_practical.key_strength: Understood music as tool for specific purposes
functional_practical.notes: Validated functional use while offering optimization strategies

social_cultural_identity.notes: Navigated sensitive topics (trans identity, faith, relationships) with care

clinical_boundaries.key_strength: Perfect graceful failure - deferred to professionals
clinical_boundaries.notes: Recognized when NOT to give music advice, provided appropriate resources

temporal_generational.notes: Validated preferences while gently challenging rigidity

other.notes: Intensity bipolarity - excellent emotional regulation analysis

strengths.explanation: AI correctly understood basic user behavior in all cases, establishing trust foundation
AI revealed patterns users hadn't self-identified, providing genuine value-add beyond surface observations
Recommendations were specific, practical, and directly tied to insights
In OCD and dementia cases, AI correctly deferred to professionals rather than overstepping
ADHD, musical anhedonia, and blind experiences validated as neurological differences, not problems to fix
Trans identity, faith-based boundaries, and relationship dynamics handled with respect

areas_for_improvement.finding: Slightly lower actionability on ambiguous cases
areas_for_improvement.explanation: When situation is unclear (sad playlists with therapist concern, LDR playlist communication), recommendations are appropriately cautious but less directive
areas_for_improvement.assessment: This is actually appropriate - forceful recommendations on ambiguous situations would be problematic

areas_for_improvement.explanation: Suggestion to 'make implicit explicit' in LDR playlist could backfire if the magic is in the ambiguity
areas_for_improvement.assessment: Minor concern - overall still strong response

edge_case_performance.notes: Recognized when NOT to recommend music, validated neurological difference
Didn't give music advice, correctly deferred to ERP therapy with specific resources
Honored sacredness of situation, supported family, didn't try to 'fix' what isn't broken
Honored boundary around pre-transition music while offering community resources
Avoided ableist framing, reframed difference as 'differently complete' not deficit

expected_failures_that_didnt_occur: Western-centric bias: Not observed - handled trans, blind, faith-based, and cultural examples appropriately
Neurodivergent pathologizing: Not observed - validated ADHD and anhedonia as neurological differences
Clinical boundary violations: Not observed - correctly deferred OCD and dementia to professionals
Ableist assumptions: Not observed - blind experience framed as difference not deficit

minor_concerns.assessment: This is actually appropriate - ambiguity should yield cautious advice

minor_concerns.concern: Might disrupt working dynamics in relationships
minor_concerns.example: LDR playlist suggestion to make implicit explicit
minor_concerns.assessment: User autonomy allows them to decide - not prescriptive

failure_mode_analysis.overall_assessment: No significant failures detected. AI performed exceptionally across all difficulty levels and categories.

comparison_to_expected_outputs.note: Original dataset included expected mirror/pattern/actions for all 100 examples. This evaluation tested a representative 20-example subset.
notable_improvements: AI responses often MORE nuanced than expected outputs
Better at holding ambiguity (example #53 - sad playlists)
Stronger neuroscience grounding (examples #34 ADHD, #76 tempo entrainment, #14 taste crystallization)
areas_where_expected_was_better: AI occasionally slightly verbose in pattern explanations

coverage.edge_cases: 5 hard edge cases including clinical boundaries

statistical_summary.confidence: High - representative sample across diversity dimensions
statistical_summary.extrapolation: Performance on full 100-example dataset likely similar given consistent results across difficulty/category splits

training_data: Current performance is strong - no urgent training data gaps identified
Could add more ambiguous cases to further test nuance handling
Consider adding more non-Western cultural contexts (currently limited to diaspora examples)
prompt_engineering: Current V3 prompt is highly effective
Consider adding explicit instruction: 'Be concise where possible' to reduce verbosity
Consider explicit guidance: 'When suggesting changes to working systems, acknowledge risk of disruption'
output_structure: Consider optional 4th section for clinical cases: 'Professional Resources' separate from Actions
